frontmatter.name: ui-ux-design-pro
frontmatter.description: UI/UX design intelligence. 107 styles, 127 palettes, 107 font pairings, 106 charts, 131 reasoning rules, 129 UX guidelines, 16 stacks (React, Next.js, Vue, Nuxt.js, Svelte, Astro, Angular, Remix, SolidJS, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, Jetpack Compose, Nuxt UI). 8 Python scripts: BM25 search, contrast checker, palette generator, token generator, type scale calculator, design system generator, UI auditor, CLI. Actions: plan, build, create, design, implement, review, fix, improve, optimize, enhance, refactor, check UI/UX code. Projects: website, landing page, dashboard, admin panel, e-commerce, SaaS, portfolio, blog, mobile app. Styles: glassmorphism, claymorphism, minimalism, brutalism, neumorphism, bento grid, dark mode, liquid glass, cyberpunk, spatial UI, data brutalism.

title: UI/UX Design Pro - Design Intelligence
description: Comprehensive UI/UX design intelligence skill with data-driven architecture. Contains 107 styles, 127 color palettes, 107 font pairings, 129 UX guidelines, 106 chart types, and 131 industry reasoning rules across 16 technology stacks. Includes 8 Python scripts: BM25 search engine, WCAG/APCA contrast checker, color palette generator, CSS token generator, type scale calculator, design system generator, UI auditor, and unified CLI. 1,875+ searchable data rows with priority-based recommendations.
